Welcome to the Feedlot and Manure Management Directory

This guidebook provides a list of resources for permitting, designing, financing, building, and managing animal waste control facilities. It also gives livestock farmers an overview of the regulations and choices in dealing with animal waste in Minnesota. It is not in the scope of this guidebook to give comprehensive technical information or explain rules particular to specific areas of the state. Rather, the purpose is to refer readers to experts in the public and private sectors that may offer assistance. There may be exceptions to the statements and explanations given within. Therefore, after gaining an overview of the guidelines, consult the organizations and materials listed for the most effective ways to improve individual operations.
